application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Rear Garden - Right Hand SideT1 - HollyReduce height by approximately 1 metre..	The tree is located in the rear garden to the right hand side.	Reduction works are part of a maintenance program to maintain the tree at a suitable and desirable size for its location.	To reduce the tree to allow for future and regular management by trimmingRear Garden - Right hand SideT2 - HazelReduce length of all branches by up to 1.8-2 metres ensuring natural shape and balance typical of species is maintained where possible. Remove horizontal stems growing into adjacent Holly and Magnolia..	The tree is located in the rear garden to the right hand side.	Reduction works are part of a maintenance program to maintain the tree at a suitable and desirable size for its location.	To reduce the extent of the encroachment from the garden area, neighbouring garden and adjacent trees/shrubs.	To allow more suitable light levels in to the areaRear Garden - Back Boundary - Right Hand SideT3 - Cherry in declineFell as close to ground level as possible and grind out stump to 200mm below ground level, removing excess grindings from site..	The tree is located in the rear garden to the right hand side towards the rear boundary area.	The tree is in a state of decline.	The tree has no long term future in its current condition.	The tree has no amenity valueRear Garden - Left Hand SideT4 - Ash Leaf MapleFell as close to ground level as possible and grind out stump to 200mm below ground level, removing excess grindings from site..	The tree is located in the rear garden to the left hand side.	The tree has become an undesirable species for its location.	To allow more suitable light levels in to the area.	Intend to replant the area with a more suitable and desirable speciesRear Garden - Back Boundary - Left Hand SideG5 - Group of LaurelReduce height to the top of the highest roof section rear of rear boundary, by a reduction of approximately 1-1.5 metres. Remove whole ste...
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree GROUP labelled G5
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
